title: Sep. C. Maenius Bassus
description: The tomb C. Maenius Bassus is located along the Via Valeria. This podium tomb with superstructure is dated to either the reign of Caius or that of Claudius. Epigraphic evidence mentions that C. Maenius C. f. Cam. Bassus was an Augustalis, an aedile, and praefectus fabrum.

properties.title: OSM location of Sepolcro di Caio Menio Basso, Vicovaro
